feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.98.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed malformed unsubscribe_url in members api response (#21437) - Steve Larson

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.98.0...v5.98.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.99.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added "exclude" option for customizing {{ghost_head}} (#21229) - Cathy Sarisky
  • ⚡️ Optimized fetching strings from the settings cache - Daniel Lockyer
  • 🎨 Changed hover color of ExitButton (#21396) - luis-411
  • 🐛 Fixed "Access Denied" error when accepting staff invite - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed malformed unsubscribe_url in members api response (#21437) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed search state bug & missing last result (#21417) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🌐 Added i18n for newsletter strings (#21433) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🌐 Added new and improved Norwegian translation (#21452) - matsbst
  • 🌐 Added Hungarian locale for Search (#21428) - Krisztian Kecskes

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.98.1...v5.99.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.99.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed newsletter not sending if locale is invalid (#21573) - Hannah Wolfe
  • 🐛 Fixed translations not being picked up in newsletters without reboot (#21549) - Cathy Sarisky

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.99.0...v5.99.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.100.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added i18n for portal, newsletters, search, comments, etc (#21547) - Hannah Wolfe
  • 🎨 Updated Portal to accept data-locale (#21420) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🐛 Fixed translations not being picked up in newsletters without reboot (#21549) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🐛 Fixed error message for when 2fa email sending fails (#21541) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed migrations for SQLite database users (#19839) (#21063) - Mark Stosberg
  • 🐛 Fixed "Unsaved post" modal shown when updating visibility in post settings (#21511) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed post not being saved when updating tags (#21503) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🌐 Updated swedish translations (#21562) - Daniel Sjöberg
  • 🌐 Updated Romanian translations (#21550) - Andrei Hodorog
  • 🌐 Updated Turkish translations (#21553) - echobilisim3421
  • 🌐 Added Polish translations for search (#21548) - mafizaki
  • 🌐 Added more Italian translations (#21535) - MonRyse
  • 🌐 Updated Romanian (RO) translation strings (#21542) - Andrei Hodorog
  • 🌐 Updated Bulgarian translations (#21533) - Yovko Lambrev
  • 🌐 Added more zh-Hant translations (#21502) - Gary Lai

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.99.0...v5.100.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.100.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed newsletter not sending if locale is invalid (#21573) - Hannah Wolfe

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.100.0...v5.100.1
